changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView:
SELECT DISTINCT shelf.id, emodle.equipment_type,emodle.id as equipment_type_id, e.equipment_code,e.id as equipment_id, a.area_code,a.id as area_id, shelf.support_rack_code as shelves_code,shelf.id as shelves_id,shelfType.support_rack_type_code as shelves_type , shelfType.id as shelves_type_id, shelf.status,box.project_id,box.project_code,box.project_name, e.equipment_code||'.'|| a.area_code||'.'||shelf.support_rack_code as position,shelf.memo, (select count(b.id) from frozen_box b where b.equipment_id = e.id and b.area_id = a.id and b.support_rack_id = shelf.id and b.status in ('2004','2006')) as count_of_used, (shelfType.support_rack_rows*shelfType.support_rack_columns-(select count(b.id) from frozen_box b where b.equipment_id = e.id and b.area_id = a.id and b.support_rack_id = shelf.id and b.status in ('2004','2006'))) as count_of_rest
FROM support_rack shelf LEFT JOIN support_rack_type shelfType ON shelf.support_rack_type_id = shelfType.id LEFT JOIN area a ON shelf.area_id = a.id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON a.equipment_id = e.id LEFT JOIN equipment_modle emodle ON e.equipment_modle_id = emodle.id LEFT JOIN frozen_box box ON box.equipment_id = e.id and box.area_id = a.id and box.support_rack_id = shelf.id and box.status in ('2004','2006')
